name: Facebook: Darkside by DuelMonster
description: This style was based on "Blacked Out - (Rounded Corners) NO ADS!" by Banderas. I've fixed a few issues and tailored it to my own liking. So before anyone complains that the "right column" is missing, that was intentional. I've always found it an unnecessary waste of space. I've only tested this using Google Chrome...
additional_info:
2013-10-14:  Updated with a minor color fix.
2013-10-03:  Updated with a few minor color fixes. (Replaced Background)
2013-09-25:  Updated with a few minor color fixes and layout fixes. (Updated Screen shots too)
2013-09-23:  Submitted to userstyles.org
